Package Classes

Class FacilityManager

java.lang.Object
Classes.FacilityManager
public class FacilityManager extends Object
Facility Manager Facility Manager class handles interactions between the local instance(s) of a given facility with the firestore database data:
  • Firebase Firestore Instance
  • Firebase Storage Reference
methods:
  • Constructor
  • checkFacilityExists
  • createFacilityFromDocument
  • addFacility

  • OnUploadPictureListener
  • OnUpdateListener
  • OnDeleteListener
